attributes.action: Stop issuing Penalty Points for overspeeeding that is not more than five.
attributes.background: I observed that many people over speed innocently and unconsciously with two or three over the limit twice within one year, they got banned from driving because of the points. This is unfair and can be limited to fines as it is done in some other parts of Europe.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you're concerned about penalty points for speeding offences but there are already small tolerances built in to the speeding offences system, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You can find out more here:

https://www.askthe.police.uk/content/Q584.htm

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
